Title: A Touch of Class
Plot: Desperate for a lucrative con, the team decides to fleece a bitter, rich divorcee but Mickey's feelings for her begin to cloud the issue.
GuestStars: Elizabeth Rider, George Potts, Craig Parkinson, Leon Ockendon, Brian Lonsdale, Surinder Duhra, Jake Canuso, Branka Katic, Tamzin Outhwaite, Ben Miles
